mapper.update:
update
set lbtCode = #{lbtCode}, lbtType = #{lbtType}, lbtImgSrc = #{lbtImgSrc}, description = #{description}, orderNum = #{orderNum}, modifyUserId = #{modifyUserId}, modifyTime = #{modifyTime} where lbtId = #{lbtId}

update
set
lbtCode = #{lbtCode},
lbtType = #{lbtType},
lbtStatus = #{lbtStatus},
lbtImgSrc = #{lbtImgSrc},
description = #{description},
orderNum = #{orderNum},
effective = #{effective},
modifyUserId = #{modifyUserId}, modifyTime = #{modifyTime} where lbtId = #{lbtId}
mapper.select:
select
from
where 1=1
and ( lbtCode LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') or lbtName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') )
order by (orderNum+0)
